title: Read Gita: Expand chapter verse table rows to show full cell content

requirements.summary: Remove truncation and allow ChapterDetailView table rows to grow vertically so all 5 columns show full wrapped text on desktop and mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: In ChapterDetailView, none of the 5 table columns use line-clamping or other truncation; long text wraps and the row height increases to fit it.
Desktop table rows show full Sanskrit, Literal English, Gen-Z Interpretation, and Action Step text without ellipses.
Mobile table rows (the horizontal-scroll table) also show full text for all columns without ellipses, with rows expanding in height as needed.
The table remains readable and aligned (cell content top-aligned) for multi-line content.

file_operations.description: Update the desktop and mobile verse tables to remove all uses of line-clamp classes (and any other truncation/ellipsis styling) from the 4 long-text columns, ensuring content wraps (e.g., whitespace-normal / break-words) and rows expand naturally while keeping cells top-aligned. Continue using the existing shadcn-ui Table and ScrollArea components for layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
